CruiseSerie.CruiseSeriesDescription: The Joint Norwegian-Russian (IMR-PINRO) winter survey for demersal fish in the Barents Sea is a combined acoustic and bottom trawl survey to obtain indices of abundance and estimates of length and weight at age of the major commercial ground fish stocks in January-March.
The joint Norwegian-Russian autumn ecosystem survey in the Barents Sea is a multi-purpose survey for monitoring hydrography and several ecosystem components in the Barents Sea in August-October.
